title: Setting up a Docker Hub pull-through cache with Tigris | Tigris Object Storage
author: Xe Iaso Senior Cloud Whisperer
description: A pull-through cache is a local cache of Docker images that can be used to speed up deployments and defend against the upcoming rate limit decreases for the Docker Hub. Learn how to make one on top of Tigris!
cntitle: 使用 Tigris | Tigris 对象存储设置 Docker Hub pull-through 缓存
cndescription: Pull-through 缓存是 Docker 镜像的本地缓存，可用于加速部署并防御即将到来的 Docker Hub 速率限制降低。 了解如何在 Tigris 之上创建一个：[了解如何在 Tigris 之上创建一个](Learn how to make one on top of Tigris!)！
